attributes.action: Allow opponents of particular petitions to register that opposition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The prime ministerial petitions scheme is a welcome development, however it seems to be somewhat flawed in that people can only register support for a particular cause but cannot register opposition to it.  This may lead to a cause appearing to have strong public support when, in fact, there are a greater number of opponents than supporters.

This sitution can easily be remedied by providing the publilc with the option of registering opposition to a cause as well the option of signing up to it.  The number of registered opponents could be displayed alongside the number of registered signatories.

rejection.details: Thanks for your feedback. Your comments have been noted.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
